ai.summary: A short, easy 1.3 km walk through a UK dale, combining the Mid Dale landscape with a view toward North Pund. Suitable for families and casual walkers.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly well-defined grassy paths with gentle gradients. Expect occasional compact earth, light mud after rain, and short sections with gates or a stile.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather and daylight before you go. Wear sturdy footwear and bring a light waterproof layer. Weather in UK dales can change quickly, so be prepared for mud, slippery grass, and wind. Stay on marked paths, watch for livestock, and carry a map or offline map on your phone. Let someone know your plans and your expected return time.
recommended_gear: Map, downloaded route, or offline navigation on your phone
ai.best_seasons: All year, with the best conditions in spring and autumn.

seo.title: Mid Dale and North Pund - Easy 1.3 km UK Hike
seo.meta_description: Explore a short, easy 1.3 km walk through Mid Dale and North Pund in the UK. Ideal for a quick, family-friendly countryside outing.
